quotes.quote: You throw your best punch, otherwise don't do it.
It's not the punch you expect that knocks you down.
An impact is like a punch. It may hurt,  but it passes.
If you can't take a punch, you should play table tennis.
The hand that punched is the hands that gives compassion.
The knock-out punch is always the one you never see coming.
Actually punching is a mistake; a heavy hitter will cut you with one shot.
It's bizarre, a punch in the face hurts less when you win than when you lose.
Art is supposed to punch you in the brain, and it's supposed to stay punched.
A punch should stay like a treasure in the sleeve. It should not be used indiscrimately.
Never throw the first punch. If you have to throw the second, try to make sure they don't get up for a third.
If someone breaks your heart just punch them in the face. Seriously. Punch them in the face and go get some ice cream.
When you get punched, you have to get up. You have no other choice. If you don't, you're not going to grow, you're not going to get better as a player.
You have to punch hard for knockouts, and to beat me, you have to knock me out.
In order to land a punch, you need to bring your fingers together into a fist. We need to join all of our forces together. That is the only way that we can win.
You can't learn to take a punch. Whether you have a glass chin or you don't, the only way of finding out is having it land.
I've never been punched in the face, so I didn't know it would hurt so much!
I land a higher percentage of punches than any boxer in boxing.
Every punch was thrown with bad intentions.
The punches came fast and hard, lying on my back in the school yard.
Every punch that's thrown is mine. Every punch that's caught, I catch....
It's the emotional punches that you can't see that are just overwhelmingly devastating to your heart - your moral fiber.
Punch a black belt in the face, he becomes a brown belt. Punch him again, purple...

Getting punched in the face with a padded glove doesn't really hurt your face. It doesn't hurt your skull. The only thing it hurts is your brain. You can feel the brain injury happening. It's an instant headache.
Sometimes integrity is a punch in the face.
Usually in fist fights you get punched in the face.
Fathers should start teaching the boys how to punch.
When someone is punched in the face, you find out what they are made of.
When you punch somebody in the ring, you have to use your whole body. I learned that it's more about technique than physical strength.
I wanted to punch him and understand him at the same time.
